articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Exclusive: Ex-Twitch CEO Emmett Shear is founding an AI startup backed by a16z - TechCrunch
articles.description: Emmett Shear, the former CEO of Twitch and briefly an OpenAI interim CEO, is launching a new AI startup, TechCrunch has learned.
articles.content:
Emmett Shear, the former CEO of Twitch, is launching a new AI startup, TechCrunch has learned. 
The startup, called Stem AI, is currently in stealth. But public documents show it was incorporated in… [+3523 chars]
